searchQuery.title: Search term(s)
searchQuery.description: Business category or type to search (e.g., 'software companies', 'restaurants', 'marketing agencies')

location.title: Location (use only one location per run)
location.description: City, state, or region to search in

maxResults.title: Number of places to extract (per each search term or URL)
maxResults.description: Maximum number of businesses to scrape

language.title: Language
language.description: Language for Google Maps results (e.g., 'en' for English, 'es' for Spanish)

minRating.title: Set a minimum star rating
minRating.description: Only scrape businesses with rating >= this value (0-5 stars). Set to 0 for no filter.

minReviews.title: Minimum number of reviews
minReviews.description: Filter out businesses with too few reviews (indicates low activity). Set to 0 for no filter.

hasWebsite.title: Scrape places with/without a website
hasWebsite.description: Only include businesses with websites (required for email extraction)

claimedListing.title: Only claimed/verified listings
claimedListing.description: Only active businesses that claimed their Google listing

hasSocialMedia.title: Must have social media profiles
hasSocialMedia.description: Only include businesses with LinkedIn/Facebook/Twitter profiles

extractEmails.title: Extract emails from websites
extractEmails.description: Visit websites and extract contact emails (adds ~$0.01 per lead). Requires 'Scrape places with website' enabled.

extractReviews.title: Extract customer reviews
extractReviews.description: Extract customer reviews for sentiment analysis (adds ~$0.02 per lead and 30s processing time). Disable for faster runs.

maxReviewsPerPlace.title: Max reviews per place
maxReviewsPerPlace.description: Number of reviews to extract per business (0 = disabled, max 100)

enableScoring.title: Enable AI Lead Scoring (A+ to F)
enableScoring.description: Score leads based on data quality, engagement signals, and ICP fit. Scores: A+ (85+), A (75+), B (65+), C (55+), D (45+), F (<45)

targetIndustries.title: Target industries for scoring (optional)
targetIndustries.description: Industries to prioritize in lead scoring (e.g., 'technology', 'healthcare', 'professional_services'). Leave empty to score all equally.

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL (optional)
webhookUrl.description: POST results to this URL when actor finishes (for Zapier, Make.com, n8n, etc)

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration
proxy.description: Proxy settings for scraping. Leave groups empty for automatic proxy selection (recommended).

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency (Advanced)
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum concurrent browser instances. Default is 3 for optimal performance. Higher values may cause CPU overload and timeouts.
